¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6965>arising<s%> from the <S%H4960>banquet<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> in his <S%H2534>wrath<s%> went into the <S%H1055>palace<s%> <S%H1594>garden<s%>: and <S%H2001>Haman<s%> stood <S%H5975>up<s%> to make <S%H1245>request<s%> for his <S%H5315>life<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%>; for he <S%H7200>saw<s%> that there was <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3615>determined<s%> against him by the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
